data.text:
After today, summer training camp will be over. These past few 
days, there was one thing that was bothering me-

It seemed like Kitasan Black was always watching 
me. She'd look in my direction every now and then, 
as if checking on me, but why…?

Y-yeah! What's wrong?! If there's 
anything bothering you, just let me know!
data.name: Kitasan Black

data.text:
Ah, preparing the equipment for the next part of training? 
Leave it to me, I'll have it ready in no time―!
data.name: Kitasan Black

data.text:
Without waiting for a response, Kitasan Black ran 
off to prepare for the next part of training.
Haa, haa… yaaaaaaaa!
data.name: Kitasan Black

data.text:
I missed the chance to ask why she was 
watching me, and training continued.

Kitasan Black's running was quite splendid. The results of summer 
training camp were already showing.
Haaaaaaa!!
data.name: Kitasan Black

data.text: Haa, haa… haa-… fuu…
data.name: Kitasan Black

choices.text: Good work! That was a good run!

data.text: Y-yeah! Thank you very much.
data.name: Kitasan Black

data.text: …Ehehe.
data.name: Kitasan Black

data.text: No, it's nothing!
data.name: Kitasan Black

data.text:
That night, after hearing there was a festival nearby, 
Kitasan Black and I had decided to go, but-

…Um, well you see. Before we head to the festival, 
do you have… a little bit of time?
data.name: Kitasan Black

data.text:
Mmmm! Running here felt really good, you know～! 
Before I knew it, training was over in the blink of an eye.
data.name: Kitasan Black

data.text:
… because of Trainer-san I feel like I've grown, 
and I can say I'm proud of that.
data.name: Kitasan Black

data.text:
Of course, there's still a lot more things 
I need to learn from now on but…
data.name: Kitasan Black

choices.text: It's because you worked hard, Kitasan

data.text: …Uu. Trainer-san, I…!
data.name: Kitasan Black

data.text:
I believed Trainer-san was someone who was 
[Amazing, and could do anything well]!
data.name: Kitasan Black

data.text:
You answered all of my questions, when I was worried about 
something we'd solve it together. An [Amazing person] who could 
solve even really difficult issues, with simple solutions
data.name: Kitasan Black

data.text: But… when I told my dad about this, he told me something.
data.name: Kitasan Black

data.text: [There's hard work that you can't see, too]
data.name: Kitasan Black

data.text: …is what he said. Hearing those words, I remembered something.
data.name: Kitasan Black

data.text:
I continued studying at home, just that. And also, just did what 
my family and coach kept telling me.
data.name: Satono Diamond

data.text:
With everyone's help I kept preparing. [To someday become a 
strong Uma Musume that can win a G1]. That's not just my dream.
data.name: Satono Diamond

data.text:
It's also my family's dearest wish. From back then and up to this 
day, we've kept aiming for that. Before I was even born…
data.name: Satono Diamond

data.text: …That's right. Even Dia-chan, was like that.
data.name: Kitasan Black

data.text:
It's so obvious, isn't it? Because everyone is like that, 
not just working hard where people can see it.
data.name: Kitasan Black

data.text:
But… unfortunately, I seemed to have forgotten that. That 
[Amazingness] overwhelmed me, until I finally realized the 
importance of [Hardwork].
data.name: Kitasan Black

data.text:
…Trainer-san too, you worked hard 
too, didn't you? All for my sake.
data.name: Kitasan Black

choices.text: I'm just doing it because I want to

data.text:
…Yeah. But that's why, I want to see 
that rewarded. Trainer-san's hardwork.
data.name: Kitasan Black

data.text: And so my Dad said-
data.name: Kitasan Black

data.text:
[The song that is sung while thinking of someone, 
is a song that will reach everyone's heart]
data.name: Kitasan Black

data.text:
…That's what he said. 
I had never really understood those words.
data.name: Kitasan Black

data.text:
That's why, with feelings of gratitude I need 
to work hard to return the favor. Not just being 
supported, but also by supporting.
data.name: Kitasan Black

data.text:
Yes. Working hard during training so I 
can produce results, and asking for a day off…
data.name: Kitasan Black

data.text:
I thought of a bunch of things, and tried to actually do a couple 
of them but… for some reason it wasn't going well.
data.name: Kitasan Black

data.text: …But, just a moment ago I thought [Ah, this is it].
data.name: Kitasan Black

data.text:
The thing I really wanted to do… 
I realized what I could do for Trainer-san.
data.name: Kitasan Black

data.text: I just want Trainer-san to be happy!
data.name: Kitasan Black

data.text:
Because, just a moment ago, 
when I saw Trainer-san's smile, it really made me happy!
data.name: Kitasan Black

data.text:
I want your efforts to be rewarded, I want to show you how 
grateful I am. But, that isn't the my only answer-
data.name: Kitasan Black

data.text:
The feeling of wanting to make you happy, I want Trainer-san 
to feel that from the bottom of my heart.
data.name: Kitasan Black

data.text: That's probably the way I can [support]!
data.name: Kitasan Black

data.text:
Those genuine and straight-forward words from Kitasan Black, 
made me feel a little embarrassed but-

choices.text: I'm glad we could both do that for each other
choices.processed: <size=36>I'm glad we could both do that for each other</size>

data.text: ! Yeah! It's great!!
data.name: Kitasan Black

data.text:
Kitasan Black's expressions was all smiles, glittering 
like fireworks. Both of us aiming to make the other 
smile, it was very much a blessing.
Allllright! With a loud voice from within, let's go～!
data.name: Kitasan Black

data.text:
With a relieved face, Kitasan Black 
threw both her arms in the air.

By supporting each other, both of us could stand tall. And with a 
stir, the sound of Taiko drums reverberated throughout the venue.
